subject: 【Job Vancancy】SMS InfoComm (Czech) s.r.o. is looking for you!!
detailContent:
SMS InfoComm (Czech) s.r.o.
We are one of the biggest repair centers in Europe with focus on repairing compute and mobile phone motherboards. Game consoles and even entire setups. In our service center, we repair computer technology of world brands, which come to us from all over Europe. We can replace any component of the motherboard and successfully repair 90-95% of all boards. We also stock spare parts for European customers of leading laptop manufacturers.

Our parent company, Wistron, is based in Taiwan and has over 20 branches worldwide, with approximately 80,000 employees. In addition to the Czech Republic, we have centers in the USA, Brazil, India, Vietnam, Japan, Mexico, Turkey, Hong Kong, Singapore, China and the Philippines.
Job description:
Business analysts play a key role in facilitating data-driven decision-making processes. Need to work closely with various departments with Headquarters and SMS Czech to gather, analyze, and translate business requirements into documentation and conceptual design from which applications and solutions are developed. Here are some common responsibilities and requirements for a business analyst:
 
Responsibilities
  1. Analyze, and validate the business needs
  2. Conduct data analysis to support these specifications and to provide comprehensive business insights.
  3. Work closely across departments in SMS Czech and with headquarters.
  4. Provide analytical support for project teams and top managers.
  5. Ensure solutions meet business needs and requirements.
 
Requirements
  1. A bachelor’s degree or up in business or related field or an MBA.
  2. Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills.
  3. Good communication and presentation skills.
  4. Better to have programming skills.
  5. Excellent documentation skills.
  6. Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills.
  7. Competency in Microsoft applications, including Word, Excel, and Outlook.
  8. Need to be able to communicate in English and Chinese.

If you are interested in this vacancy , kindly send your CV to Claire Chang at Claire_Chang@servms.com

subject: 【Recruitment】PEGATRON
detailContent:
The Company
PEGATRON Corporation (hereafter referred to as “PEGATRON”) was founded on January 1, 2008. With abundant product development experience and vertically integrated manufacturing, we are committed to providing clients with innovative design, systematic production and manufacturing service in order to comprehensively and efficiently satisfy all of our customers’ needs. PEGATRON features a solid R&D team, friendly, fast service quality as well as a high degree of employee cohesion. Furthermore, we have combined EMS and ODM industries to become an emerging Design and Manufacturing Service (DMS) company. Consequently, we are able to offer industry-leading, state-of-the-art products and profitable business opportunities for our partners.

Our outstanding computer services include designing computers, computer hardware, portable devices and networks and associated peripheral devices for others related to operational and supporting services; computer information technology and computer programming consultation; designing, updating, duplications, and maintenance of computer software(program) and providing extended information service in the field of computers and communication, i.g. computer systems analysis, computer network systems analysis, mobile telephone communication transmission for special customer demands.
 
Additionally, we provide many flexible and reliable intangible products, including installation, repair or maintenance of computer related products, portable devices,  telephone, household appliance, networks associated peripheral devices, and etc. We also provide hardware and software service for telecommunications connections, transmission of information by electronic communications networks and providing information about telecommunication according to customer requirements.

subject: 【Job Opening】Administrative Assistant @ PHISON India
detailContent:
About Phison
 
More Than Two Decades of NAND Controller Technology Expertise

Founded in Taiwan in 2000, Phison started with the world’s first single-chip USB flash drive controller IC.
Over the next 20+ years Phison grew to become a market leader in NAND flash controllers and NAND storage solutions, including PCIe/SATA/PATA SSD, UFS, eMMC, SD and USB. Today, nearly one out of every four SSDs shipped worldwide is a Phison solution.
Job Descriptions
  1. Collaborate with a local CPA to comply with accounting and tax regulations in India.
  2. As the liaison between Phison India and Phison HQ, responsible for delivering and implementing HQ policies, and reporting to the HQ accounting manager.
  3. Apply accounting principles to all data entry, AP/AR posting and tracking, etc., for the general ledger.
  4. Banking operations related to withdrawals and payments, etc.
  5. Assist with the procurement of office equipment, office renting, and related contractual documents.
  6. Cowork with the HR Manager at headquarters to support HR operations in India. 

Qualifications
  1. This position serves as the accounting communication channel between Phison India and Phison HQ. Proficiency in English is essential, while Mandarin is an added benefit.
  2. Bachelor of Accounting or related fields in Commerce.
  3. At least 1 year of accounting work experience in the industry (experience in the technical or electronic industry is preferred).

Salary Range
◆Salary ranges from 40,000 INR to 60,000 INR per month, depending on the skills and experience required for the listed responsibilities.

Location
Hyderabad, India

Please send your CV to oliver_ou@phison.com

subject: 【Job Vancancy】Technical Supervisor of MetChem(For Indian Student)
detailContent:
Company Introduction
Being one of the mature metal finishing techniques, electroless nickel plating (ENP) was developed in mid 20th century and has been applied to manufacturing industries likes automotive, electron consumer, energy facilities, and automation. Resulted from the blossoming of EV, VR device, and semiconductor manufacturing, the demand and application are upgrading and progressing.
 
MetChem Products Corp. at Delaware, USA is one of the leading professional special chemical suppliers in metal finish industry. MetChem’s electroless nickel are widely applied in the manufacturing of products of Seagate, Western Digital, Toshiba, Emersion, Hitachi, Canon, and Ricoh international leading enterprises.
 
Since 2000 MetChem have collaborated with HLHC Industry Co., Ltd in Taiwan and focused on electroless nickel of metal finish industry. Expands excellent technique to China, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Europe, USA, and India.
 
Due to the resilience of supply chain and global market, HLHC and MetChem is looking for technical supervisor to be in Chennai, India. As a Technical Supervisor, you will play a key role in development of ENP that meet a high bar for performance in India.You will work closely with India manufacturing team to provide technical service to current and potential customers. In addition, co-work with R&D remotely to develop the customized solution and present your influence in pre- and post-sales environment.
 
If you have intending to career in India, we wish to meet you.
 
MetChem is committed to be the best special chemical supplier in Indo-Pacific market.Gaining the ability of ENP to World’s Manufacturing Industry with our professional technique and knowledge, close technical service, and deep interaction with the clients.
MetChem is looking for Technical Supervisor
Working Place: Chennai, India.
Job Type: Temporary
Contract length: 12 months
Salary: ₹360,000.00 - ₹600,000.00 per year
Application Link

Job Description
As a Technical Supervisor, you will play a key role in development of electroless nickel plating (ENP) that meet a high bar for performance in India. You will work closely with India manufacturing team to provide technical service to current and potential customers. In addition, co-work with R&D remotely to develop the customized solution and present your influence in pre- and post-sales environment.

Responsibilities
  1. Pre-sales work including visiting, demo, test plating, and product verification.
  2. On-site technical service for customer’s trial.
  3. Post-sales work likes training, technical consulting, and troubleshooting remotely or on-site.
  4. Observation of assigned accounts regarding technical requirement.
  5. Keep good relationship with customer and upgrade customer satisfaction.
  6. Business development for new product or application.
  7. Provide periodic updates to headquarter and representative.
  8. Manage laboratory.
Minimum qualifications
  1. Bachelor’s degree in engineering, science, or equivalent practical experience
  2. Experience in Chemical LAB skill: Titration, Mechanical Testing, Metallographic, or Electrochemistry.
Preferred qualifications
  1. Self-starter, able to work with little to no supervision.
  2. Strong communication skills, able to work effectively with people cross-functionally at all levels within the organization.
  3. Aggressive, persistent, and can-do attitude.
  4. Ability to travel up to 25% of the time.
For more information, please contact iansu@hlhc.com.tw
